content.text: Hi, I'm a computer technician, but I secretly hate my job.
Hi, I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
What's your favorite thing about marketing?
I like the creative aspect of it. I also like the idea of being able to help businesses grow.
That makes sense. I'm actually not very creative, so that's why I'm not very good at my job.
I'm sure you're better at your job than you think you are.
Thanks, but I'm really not. I just don't have the passion for it that I think I need to be successful.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any plans to change careers?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do.
Well, I hope you find something you're passionate about.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds like fun. I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great. Maybe we could hang out sometime and do something fun.
I'd love that. Let's exchange numbers and we can make plans.
Sounds good. I'll text you my number.
